For everyone who can't install, try downloading the cd which isn't working again. For example, if the installation can't find the files on cd 2, just download cd 2 again. And if everythings fucked up, just download everything again. That will work for sure.

Also, important, always do a hash-check after the download is finished. Sometimes your client tells you that you have 100% but after the hashcheck it tells you that you have for example 99,9 %. Than you have to restart your client to finish it again. It will just download the last bit. With bigger files like this I even do 2 hashchecks, just to be safe.

Install:
1. Using PowerISO Mount Disk 1 and install using setup
2. You will be asked to insert disk 2, simply mount disk to and click ok, the installation should continue. continue this process until the game is installed.
3. A desktop icon will now be available on your desktop but first you must copy the crack file from the crack folder to something like C:ProgramFiles/Konami/Silent Hill
4. Start The Game From The Desktop
(This Process worked for me using Vista Ultimate 32bit. it should work with xp)

Ok I'm a total noob at this, this is my first time ever downloading a game through a torrent, and I'm really stuck, I already downloaded the game, but I don't know how to install it or whatever.
I already got programs like WinRAR, PowerISO. But I don't know what to do, please some help?

Alright lemme walk ya through this. I had no iso programs on my computer before, and spent 1 hour fiddling around with poweriso before I found a great solution. This should totally work for you.

1. Go to http://www.daemon-tools.cc/eng/downloads and download the first trial (the advanced trial; I don't think you even need the advanced version for this but you might as well). Install it, and restart your computer.

2. The daemon interface should come up. If it doesn't, simply find the program where you installed it and boot it. On the top row of buttons you should see a green "play" symbol. This is the button used for mounting image files. Click it, and then navigate to the directory you have the torrent in. You should see the crack folder and the five mds files. Mount the first mds file (disk one). An autoplay should come up; if it doesn't, open your computer and double click on the g drive. Hit install and the install wizard should begin.

3. Follow the prompts like you would with any other installation. About 1 minute in, it will give you a dialog box that tells you to insert disk 2. Don't click ok or cancel... simply navigate back to the daemon tools interface. Right next to the green mount button we used before, there is a black "stop" button for unmounting. Click that button. 

4. Now, you have no virtual disks in your virtual drive. Hit the mount button again and now mount the second mds file (disk two). Navigate back to the installation prompt and click okay. 

5. It will ask for the other disks in time; when the prompt comes up, unmount the current disk, mount the next one, and click okay.

6. At the very end of the installation it will ask you to put in the 1st disk again. Click cancel. It's just asking you to play the game from the first disk, but since we don't have any disks, that's why we have the crack.

7. Navigate back to the torrent folder and open the subfolder: crack. Drag sh3 out onto the desktop. Then find the directory where you installed the game. Default will be in program files ---> konami ---> silent hill 3. Replace that sh3 with the crack sh3 and that's it.

Hope that has helped some of y'all with chu problems. Enjoi.  

7.

Ok for anyone who cant install this, this is how i did it and it works perfectly for me.

(1) there are 2 sets of each disk, mdf and mds. firstly mount mds disk 1 (with daemon tools or some other program) and view the files on the disk.

(2) go down to setup (220kb) double click, and let the installation begin.

(3) when asked to insert the next disk, merely mount the disk 2 mds file and click ok, and do the same for the rest of the disks it asks for. (disk 3 then 4 then 5)

(4) finally re-mount disk 1 when asked and enjoy getting scared shitless :D
Keep seeding ppl! =))

For those who have save errors and use Vista:
Try executing as administrator. The default folder (C:\Program Files) is read-only for non-elevated programs. (Means: if you don't run it as administrator, the game can't write saves in C:\Program Files). 

I always install games to C:\Games or such, so Vista stops annoying me.
